short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows the current local time in Iran.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows the local time in Iran. You can easily find the current local time in Iran with a glance. If you want to develop a similar extension for other countries, please refer to the GitHub address mentioned in the extension details.
